item.title: Is that Red Wine Good Enough?
item.description: Exploring Data Exploring Features Transforming Target Feature Exploring Predictors Visually Checking Correlation Feature Engineering Fitting Model Splitting Data Fitting Model on Training Data Checking Model Performance Summary Inisght Letâ€™s assume that we have been hired by a winery to build a predictive model to check the qulity of their red wine. The traiditional way of wine testing is done by a human expert. Thus the process is prone to human error.
